description:
Elevate your daily commute with the KTV Drive Pro 300+ Front light, a compact powerhouse. Whether you're weaving through traffic amongst distracted drivers or caught in an unexpected rain shower, this light is your reliable companion. It boasts three high-output LED emitters for 300 lumens of illumination and a conspicuous daytime flash mode. Offering six output modes and a maximum 100-hour runtime, this versatile light ensures your safety and visibility during your daily adventures, making your commute worry-free.

  • 6 lighting modes, 3 in steady and 3 in flashing; steady: 300 lumens (3h), 200 lumens (4.5h), 100 lumens (8h), flash 1–20 lumens (100h), day flash–300 lumens (28h) and pulse–100 lumens (12h)
  • 1-button interface takes you through all your light’s modes
  • Modern lens technology provides a strong, even flood light to ensure maximum visibility and safety
  • Fast charging (3.0 and 2.0) waterproof USB C charging (cable not included) – full charging takes ~3 hours
  • LED charging indicator lets you know light needs charging, when it’s charging and when it’s ready to go
  • Rugged aluminum body is durable and dissipates heat well
  • Silicone, tool-free mounting strap
  • IPX7 waterproofing protects your light from heavy downpours
name: Lezyne KTV Drive Pro 300 Front Light
